ofx:section.ofx:title: Use Cases
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: The use cases area of the administrator page describes rules for views and actions combined in a group. Every use case is assigned to a single category to create a better overview, like the Views and Actions page. It is also possible to edit or change the names and descriptions for every use case level. This site is set up hierarchically, from a use case name to the Views and Actions, where you can add or remove single rules for each type. If you want to add or remove a rule to an existing use case, simply press the green add button and select the required entry or click the red remove button to delete the selected item. These changes take effect without saving the rule.
